TopicTitle: Persistent crash bug on starting a sandbox save.

Articles.Content:
**KSP Version:** 1.0.2 from readme.txt, 00842 from buildID.txt (no idea why they're different, or why buildID isn't in the standard format), Windows 32-bit (Steam version).

**What Happens**

Whenever I start a sandbox save (default settings for difficulty, flag and save name), the game crashes to desktop immediately. This has persisted through a full reinstall through Steam.

**Steps to reproduce**

Start a new save, setting the game mode to sandbox. Game crashes immediately.

**Log files**

First crash log: [https://www.dropbox.com/sh/78i2osj6fyyk9mc/AACBAWLI1w3NbROy3p1sbdixa?dl=0](https://www.dropbox.com/sh/78i2osj6fyyk9mc/AACBAWLI1w3NbROy3p1sbdixa?dl=0)

Second crash log: [https://www.dropbox.com/sh/m7fvd4dl3sv61fd/AAA-cn5OO_hhp9fytLVit5sNa?dl=0](https://www.dropbox.com/sh/m7fvd4dl3sv61fd/AAA-cn5OO_hhp9fytLVit5sNa?dl=0)

DxDiag system specification: [https://www.dropbox.com/s/9tkm936hhgv38xh/DxDiag.txt?dl=0](https://www.dropbox.com/s/9tkm936hhgv38xh/DxDiag.txt?dl=0)

Hi somebody1212, please do not use -force-opengl to start KSP in Windows, it is not supported and is unreliable.

If you insist on using it you must run KSP in fullscreen mode, [**see here for more info.**](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/117307-OpenGL-Mode-Doesn-t-Work)
Ok, yes, removing that fixed it, thanks.
